title: Update screen error
body:
When I try to update it scans files for a few minutes than says error check logs for more info. 

This only happening to me/how can i fix it ?

thanks

replies.body:
Hi,

Check out the support page on [patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) to start with - it has some things you can try to get around the issue.

Cheers
Mindstar
